Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project in Chancellor's portfolio.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

oneLiner.description: A brief description of the project.

logoUrl.description: URL of the project logo or image.

techStack.description: List of technologies used in the project.

deepDive.description: Deep dive of the project. This field can hold markdown or other formatted text.

demoUrl.description: URL of the live demo of the project.

githubUrl.description: URL of the project's GitHub repository.

Skill.title: Skill
Skill.description: Represents a skill or technology used by Chancellor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Skill entity.

name.description: Name of the skill or technology.

category.description: Category of the skill (e.g., Frontend, Backend, AI/ML, DevOps).

ProjectSkill.title: ProjectSkill
ProjectSkill.description: Represents the relationship between projects and skills.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ProjectSkill entity.
Unique identifier for the ContactFormSubmission entity.

submissionDate.description: Date and time the form was submitted.

UserStatus.title: UserStatus
UserStatus.description: Represents a user's online status and presence.

lastSeen.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the user was last active.

email.description: The user's email address for display purposes.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

UserAffirmationInteraction.title: UserAffirmationInteraction
UserAffirmationInteraction.description: Represents a user's interaction with a generated affirmation.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

affirmation.description: The content of the affirmation the user interacted with.

interaction.description: The type of interaction (e.g., liked, disliked, saved as favorite).

timestamp.description: The server timestamp of when the interaction occurred.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores project data. Each document represents a single project.

/skills/{skillId}.description: Stores skill data. Each document represents a single skill.

/projectSkills/{projectSkillId}.description: Stores the relationships between projects and skills.

/userInteractions/{interactionId}.description: Stores user interactions with affirmations, such as likes, dislikes, and favorites.
